templates.title: DataPulse
templates.subtitle: Analytics Dashboard
templates.description: Dashboards, metrics, data sources, and visualizations. Demonstrates stats-heavy UI, multiple chart types, cron jobs.

templates.title: Auth
templates.description: JWT login, signup, and protected routes. Demonstrates auth flow with email/password forms.

templates.title: Blog CMS
templates.subtitle: Full-Stack Blog / Content Management System
templates.description: Posts, authors, categories, tags with many-to-many. Demonstrates m:n relations, search, and multi-page editor.

templates.title: Booking
templates.subtitle: Appointment Scheduling System
templates.description: Services, providers, clients, and appointments. Demonstrates date/time fields, email, cron, status workflows.

templates.title: Chat
templates.subtitle: Full-Stack Messaging Application
templates.description: Conversations, messages, and multi-user support. Demonstrates m:n relations, optional fields, two-pane layout.

templates.title: MediClinic
templates.subtitle: Appointment Scheduling & Patient Management
templates.description: Doctors, patients, appointments, and department tracking. Demonstrates scheduling workflows, department filters, stats.

templates.title: SalesCRM
templates.subtitle: Full-Stack Sales CRM Application
templates.description: Contacts, companies, deals pipeline, and activity tracking. Demonstrates enum workflows, kanban layout, complex filters.

templates.title: Dashboard
templates.description: Admin dashboard with stats, charts, and user management. Role-based access with compact data views.

templates.title: E-Commerce
templates.subtitle: Online Store
templates.description: Products, categories, cart, orders, and checkout. Demonstrates complex cart mutations, order items, webhooks.

templates.title: Expense Tracker
templates.description: Track expenses with budgets, charts, and category filters. Visual spending breakdown and persistence.

templates.title: Fullstack Todo
templates.description: Todo app with Express API and Prisma database. Full CRUD with server-side persistence.

templates.title: HelpDesk
templates.subtitle: Ticket Support System
templates.description: Tickets, agents, departments, and SLA tracking. Demonstrates priority/status workflows, assignment, stats.

templates.title: Inventory Manager
templates.subtitle: Warehouse & Stock Management System
templates.description: Products, warehouses, stock levels, suppliers, movements. Demonstrates composite indexes, cron, queue, stock transactions.

templates.title: Kanban
templates.subtitle: Board & Card Management
templates.description: Boards, columns, and cards with drag-style kanban layout. Demonstrates multi-column layout, card ordering, labels.

templates.title: Landing
templates.description: Marketing landing page with hero, features grid, pricing tiers, and call-to-action sections.

templates.title: LearnAIR
templates.subtitle: Learning Management System
templates.description: Courses, lessons, enrollment, and progress tracking. Demonstrates junction with extra fields, email, queue.

templates.title: Monitoring
templates.subtitle: Server Monitoring Dashboard
templates.description: Servers, metrics, alerts, and incidents with severity tracking. Demonstrates real-time status, alert filtering, incident mgmt.

templates.title: Melodia
templates.subtitle: Music Library & Playlists
templates.description: Artists, albums, songs, and playlists with m:n relations. Demonstrates deep nesting, many-to-many, playback UI.

templates.title: Portfolio
templates.subtitle: Developer Portfolio Site
templates.description: Frontend-only portfolio with projects, skills, and contact. Demonstrates section-based layout, icons, responsive grids.

templates.title: ProjectFlow
templates.subtitle: Full-Stack SaaS Project Management
templates.description: A complete project management app in ~260 lines of AIR. Demonstrates every block type AirEngine supports. Transpiles to React + Express + Prisma (client/ + server/).

templates.title: PropertyHub
templates.subtitle: Real Estate Listing Platform
templates.description: Agents, properties, inquiries, and categories. Demonstrates property type/status enums, grid layouts, search.

templates.title: RestaurantPOS
templates.subtitle: Point of Sale System
templates.description: Tables, menu items, orders, and order items. Demonstrates order status workflows, sales stats, table management.

templates.title: SocialFeed
templates.subtitle: Social Network Feed App
templates.description: Posts, comments, likes, and follows. Demonstrates m:n relations, self-referential follows.

templates.title: Survey Builder
templates.subtitle: Form/Survey Application
templates.description: Surveys, questions, responses, and results analytics. Demonstrates deep nested relations, queue, progress bars.

templates.title: Todo
templates.description: Classic todo app with filters and local persistence. Add, complete, and delete tasks.
